conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: MARGARELON, a bastard son of Priam
CALCHAS, a Trojan priest, taking part with the Greeks
THERSITES, a deformed and scurrilous Greek
CASSANDRA, daughter to Priam, a prophetess
Trojan and Greek Soldiers, and Attendants
SCENE: Troy and the Greek camp before it
